actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ala makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Lightning's Kiss (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The ala launches a bolt of lightning at up to three targets it can see within 30 feet of it. Each target must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

special_abilities.name: Flyby
special_abilities.desc: The ala doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

special_abilities.name: Poisonous Flesh
special_abilities.desc: The ala's poison infuses its flesh. A creature that touches the ala or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 (2d6) poison damage.

special_abilities.name: Storm's Strength
special_abilities.desc: If the ala is outside and an electrical storm is within 1 mile of it, creatures have disadvantage on their saving throws against the ala's Lightning's Kiss.
